Node.Description: Open the All sales orders form

Annotation.Description:
Company = USMF A purchase order is received from an existing customer (US-003) for the quantity of 5 for a currently stocked item (D0001), and for the quantity of 1 for installation (S0001). A Sales Order is created and confirmed. A packing slip is generated for “All” quantities and posted. An Invoice is generated for the packing slip quantity.
Spot validation is completed along the way as well as the Sales Order having an “Invoiced” status at completion of the scenario. The customer account is verified to be updated with the posted invoice transaction.
Annotation.Title: Read the note. Then go to Sales and marketing > Common > Sales orders > All sales orders.

Node.Description: Click New
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Customer account field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 3 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Click OK
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Item number field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 10 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
In the Quantity field, enter '5.00'

Annotation.Title: In the Quantity field, enter '5.00' then press tab.

Node.Description: In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Site field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 0 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
Click Add line
In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Item number field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, go to the next page
In the grid, go to the next page
In the grid, go to the next page
In the grid, select row number 9 (zero based index)
In the grid, click the row
In the grid, mark the selected row
In the Quantity field, enter '1.00'

Annotation.Title: In the Quantity field, enter '1.00' then press tab.

Node.Description: In the field, open the lookup form

Annotation.Title: In the Site field, click the drop down button.

Node.Description: In the grid, click the row
On the action pane, click Sales order

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Sales order.

Node.Description: Click Totals
Click OK

Annotation.Description: Subtotal amount: 2650.00 Cash discount: 13.25 Sales tax: 192.13
Annotation.Title: Verify the information in the note. Then click OK.

Node.Description: On the action pane, click Sell

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Sell.

Node.Description: Click Sales order confirmation
Click OK
Click OK
On the action pane, click Pick and pack

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Pick and pack.

Node.Description: Click Packing slip
Toggle the expansion of the Parameters section
In the Quantity field, enter 'All'
Click OK
Click OK
On the action pane, click Invoice

Annotation.Title: Verify the Sales order status is "Delivered". The status shoudl appear beside the customer name at the top of the page. Then on the action pane, click Invoice.

Node.Description: Click Invoice
Toggle the expansion of the Parameters section
Click OK
Click OK
Close the SalesTable form

Annotation.Title: Verify the sales order status is now "Invoiced". Then close the Sales order form.

Node.Description: Close the SalesTableListPage form
Open the All customers form

Annotation.Title: Go to Accounts receivable > Common > Customers > All customers.

Node.Description: In the grid, select row number 3 (zero based index)
On the action pane, click Customer

Annotation.Title: On the action pane, click Customer.

Node.Description: Click Transactions
Close the CustTrans form

Annotation.Title: Verify a transaction exists for $2842.13. Then close the Customer transactions form.

Node.Description: Close the CustTable form
